languages.text: "Желай они совершить святотатство, здесь все было бы изгажено. Нет, они просто искали тихое местечко. Умные подонки".
"Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."
languages.original_text: "Желай они совершить святотатство, здесь все было бы изгажено. Нет, они просто искали тихое местечко. Умные подонки".

traits.locale_text: "Had they intended to commit sacrilege, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place. Crafty scum."
"Had they intended to commit sacrilege, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place. Crafty scum."
"Had they intended to commit sacrilege, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Crafty scum."

"Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

languages.text: "Wäre Blasphemie ihr oberstes Ziel gewesen, hätten sie die Krypta bis zur Unkenntlichkeit geschändet. Nein, sie haben lediglich ein ruhiges Versteck gebraucht. Hinterhältiger Abschaum."
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre Blasphemie ihr oberstes Ziel gewesen, hätten sie die Krypta bis zur Unkenntlichkeit geschändet. Nein, sie haben lediglich ein ruhiges Versteck gebraucht. Hinterhältiger Abschaum."

languages.text: « S'ils avaient voulu commettre un sacrilège, ils auraient saccagé la crypte au point de la rendre méconnaissable. Non, ils avaient simplement besoin d'un endroit discret où se cacher. Maudite vermine. »
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils avaient voulu commettre un sacrilège, ils auraient saccagé la crypte au point de la rendre méconnaissable. Non, ils avaient simplement besoin d'un endroit discret où se cacher. Maudite vermine. »

languages.text: «Si su intención hubiese sido el sacrilegio, la cripta estaría irreconocible. No. Solo buscaban un lugar donde esconderse. Escoria artera».
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

traits.locale_text: «Si su intención hubiese sido el sacrilegio, la cripta estaría irreconocible. No. Solo buscaban un lugar donde esconderse. Escoria artera».

languages.text: 「冒涜を意図していたのなら、彼らは地下室を見分けがつかないほど汚していただろう。いや、単に隠れるための静かな場所が必要だったのだ。クズどもめ」
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

traits.locale_text: 「冒涜を意図していたのなら、彼らは地下室を見分けがつかないほど汚していただろう。いや、単に隠れるための静かな場所が必要だったのだ。クズどもめ」

languages.text: “如果他们真的打算亵渎这个地方，那他们早就把这里玷污得根本认不出来了。不，他们仅仅想找个安静的地方躲起来，那些狡猾的渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

traits.locale_text: “如果他们真的打算亵渎这个地方，那他们早就把这里玷污得根本认不出来了。不，他们仅仅想找个安静的地方躲起来，那些狡猾的渣滓。”

languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."

languages.text: "Niyetleri kutsala hürmetsizlik olsaydı mahzeni tanınmayacak hâle getirene dek kirletirlerdi. Hayır, saklanacak ıssız bir yer arayışındaymışlar. Sinsi pislikler."
languages.original_text: "Were sacrilege their intention, they would have defiled the crypt beyond recognition. No, they simply needed a quiet place to hide. Devious scum."
